skins.selfIntroduction: Milord, are you interested in me...? Mm... this Ibuki, who was never born, and has no history or accomplishments to speak of... Um, my hobby is poetry, and I'm skilled in swordsmanship! Are you satisfied with that? Um, also, I'm not very good around people...
skins.acquisition: Was it your voice that beckoned me from my timeless slumber? This lowly Ibuki, though still in training, shall be yours to use as you see fit.
skins.details: Milord, w-welcome... I wasn't able to prepare much for your arrival... but would you like some tea?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Spending time alone with Milord... somehow... makes my heart pound...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, if you have no further orders for me, may I go over there to meditate?
skins.secretaryIdle3: In order to hone my swordsmanship, I practice my strokes a thousand times every day... Don't worry, Milord, I already finished while you were gone.
skins.secretaryTouch: You'd like me to put on a show? S-Sorry... in front of other people... I can't...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Clear the mind, and purify the six roots... Eek! Mi, Milord...

skins.shipDescription: Milord, it's starting to snow... If it suits you, please take shelter under Ibuki's umbrella.
skins.acquisition: Milord, it's starting to snow... If it suits you, please take shelter under Ibuki's umbrella.
skins.login: Milord, shall we go outside together?
skins.details: I'll have to thank Houshou for this lovely kimono...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Achoo! ...I'm cute when I sneeze? D- don't make fun of me...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Aren't there some big festivals in the wintertime? I guess you could say... I'm a little interested... only a little!
skins.secretaryTouch: Is there someplace you'd like to go, Milord? Of course I'll accompany you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Um, Milord, your hands are cold...

skins.shipDescription: This is my first time wearing Western clothes... Um, Milord! Does this outfit... suit Ibuki well...?
skins.acquisition: This is my first time wearing Western clothes... Um, Milord! Does this outfit... suit Ibuki well...?
skins.login: I am unsure how I should conduct myself at a "banquet..." Milord, may I just follow you?
skins.details: These foreign beverages and teas have quite a distinctive flavor...
skins.secretaryIdle1: There are so many things at this banquet that I simply do not understand... Ah, please don't get the wrong idea... I merely realized that there is much for me to learn still.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Actually, it was Miss Seattle who invited me here... She's quite a charismatic person.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Though I prefer my outings to be a bit more... introspective, I don't mind the camaraderie and joyfulness here.
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, it feels nice when the wind gently strokes my cheeks.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: D-do these clothes not suit me after all?

skins.shipDescription: The Dragon Empery's "Spring Festival" is... filled with fun, liveliness, and pure jubilation. I can feel my true feelings welling up... Maybe, an environment like this would suit me pretty well...
skins.acquisition: The Dragon Empery's "Spring Festival" is... filled with fun, liveliness, and pure jubilation. I can feel my true feelings welling up... Maybe, an environment like this would suit me pretty well...
skins.login: The warm glow of the lanterns and the vivid, red decorations... it's all so beautiful...
skins.details: Hmm, I'm a lot more outgoing than usual? Maybe the festive atmosphere is rubbing off on me. Milord, do you think... I'm acting strange...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, Ibuki will be performing a sword dance at the Spring Festival banquet tonight... Um, it's my first time performing in front of everyone, so I'm a bit nervous...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, Miss Akashi seems to be selling firecrackers. I heard they are a bit like fireworks... Huh? They are firecrackers, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Milord, those things hanging on the walls are "fai chun," right? I see, there's something written in them... I wonder what it means...
skins.secretaryTouch: Around this time, the cold begins to recede. Soon, spring shall arrive... I see, so this is why people hang "fai chun" on the walls...
